ygData.subject: Re: Lambent Lament
ygData.msgSnippet: I refuse to buy ANY lambent stones on principle :)  But that said I have had people give them to me without even asking!  One was from someone I had never
ygData.messageBody:
I refuse to buy ANY lambent stones on principle :) But that said I have had
people give them to me without even asking! One was from someone I had
never grouped with or met prior to the time she gave it to me. Sometimes it
is nice being a bard *grin*

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server


>From: John.Curry@...
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: [eqbards] Lambent Lament
>Date: Wed, 27 Oct 1999 10:33:52 -0600
>
>I am kicking myself in the head!!!
>
>Last night, someone in South Karana was auctioning a lambent stone for 25
>plat!!!! And I had nooo cash :(((
>
>Sevin Tercet <Mischief>
>26th Human Bard on Brell
